item.title: Debug logging in Go
item.description: My project, lifelight, is written in Go and designed to run on low-powered Raspberry Pis. I wanted minimal overhead in the production build, so I implemented a logging system that is compiled out in non-debug builds. This is made easy using Go’s build constraints.
